title: EUNE patch 7.19
body: Hello,i am looking for an answer about trouble with the EUNE server.I know that riot is working on it but can we have an update about what's happening and wheather riot is close to solving it.Tnx for reading!

replies.body:
I lost 100 lp yesterday cuz i cant play my games...
Now will loose another 200 lp on 3v3 and 5v5 ..,

There were still some issues after maintenance, but we have updates being posted on the [service status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#eune) page.  No eta or additional information at the moment, but we're on it!

I hope they fix it soon because I have xp boost running and I just cant join any games .. or when I do in blind pick it is vs plat/diamond players and I am 
only lv 19 . I dont really want to waste that xp boost just waiting for playable game.
